name: ThingSmartMatterKit
prefix_header_contents:
#ifdef __OBJC__
  #import <YYModel/YYModel.h>
  #import "ThingSmartMatterKit.h"
  #import "NSError+ThingMatter.h"
  #import "ThingSmartMatterDevice.h"
  #import "ThingMatterDeviceConnectManage.h"
  #import "ThingMatterAttributeReaderHelper.h"
  
  #undef ThingLog
  #undef ThingSDKLogDebug
  #undef ThingSDKLogInfo
  #undef ThingSDKLogWarn
  #undef ThingSDKLogError

  #define ThingLog(...)           ThingSDKLog(1, @"ThingSmartMatterKit", @"", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define ThingSDKLogDebug(...)           ThingSDKLog(0, @"ThingSmartMatterKit", @"", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define ThingSDKLogInfo(...)           ThingSDKLog(1, @"ThingSmartMatterKit", @"", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define ThingSDKLogWarn(...)           ThingSDKLog(2, @"ThingSmartMatterKit", @"", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define ThingSDKLogError(...)           ThingSDKLog(3, @"ThingSmartMatterKit", @"", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
#endif
